name: Avast Ye! (TylerRVG)
description:
Shoot down enemy ships! Touch them with your own to put some of your own crew on board and capture them as allies! Keep playing until you die, or until your screen is so filled up with friendly pirate ships that the game is impossible to lose (Because the friendly AI shoots down enemy ships as soon as they spawn)!

Controls: WASD = Movement,  Left click = Fire Cannons.

Made in one hour.

https://onehourgamejam.com/
